text: tavada ovun veta apage vadan pæhædili lesa parayanaya kara pen vanu labana vita pratiksepa kalavunge muhunuvala pilikul bava numba dakinu æta. ovun veta apage vadan parayanaya kara penvannan hata pahara dimata ovuhu tæt karati. eheyin numba pavasanu. mita vada napuru deyak pilibanda numbalata mama dænum dennada? (eya deva vadan) pratiksepa karannanta allah pratigna kala (nira) ginnaya. tavada yomu vana sthanaya napuru viya
